thread.title: Lebanon's beaches trashed by messy politics

title: Lebanon's beaches trashed by messy politics
text:
Lebanon's beaches trashed by messy politics Tuesday, February 06, 2018 - 01:27 
Notorious landfill sites east of Beirut are set to expand as Lebanon tries to tackle it's waste problem. But critics argue the country's messy political situation is leaving an untidy mark on the landscape. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Notorious landfill sites east of Beirut are set to expand as Lebanon tries to tackle it's waste problem. But critics argue the country's messy political situation is leaving an untidy mark on the landscape.
